title: DBT Local Config
description: DBT Catalog, Manifest and Run Results file path config.

dbtCatalogFilePath.title: DBT Catalog File Path
dbtCatalogFilePath.description: DBT catalog file path to extract dbt models with their column schemas.

dbtManifestFilePath.title: DBT Manifest File Path
dbtManifestFilePath.description: DBT manifest file path to extract dbt models and associate with tables.

dbtRunResultsFilePath.title: DBT Run Results File Path
dbtRunResultsFilePath.description: DBT run results file path to extract the test results information.
